title: African immigrant says Italian politics built on "witch-hunts and hatred towards migrants"
text:
African immigrant says Italian politics built on "witch-hunts and hatred towards migrants" 1:56pm EST - 01:37 
African immigrants said on Friday they want to see an end to the language of hate they say Italian political parties are encouraging following national elections. Michelle Hennessy reports   
African immigrants said on Friday they want to see an end to the language of hate they say Italian political parties are encouraging following national elections. Michelle Hennessy reports  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/03/09/african-immigrant-says-italian-politics?videoId=407552781&videoChannel=13421
